summaryOfNewsArticle: A new public policy initiative, launched by the City Council on March 15, 2023, aims to enhance accessibility and inclusion in public services through greater public participation. The proposal was made public on March 15, with a feedback period open from April 1 to April 10, 2023. During this time, Community Feedback Forums were held across various neighborhoods to gather resident input. The policy was officially announced on April 15, 2023, after reviewing both expert recommendations and public feedback. The initiative, known as the Public Participation Initiative, underscores a commitment to inclusive governance and community-driven decision-making.
title: City Launches Public Participation Initiative to Improve Accessible Public Services
